an5.59:4.1: “Mendicants, it’s hard to find someone gone forth when old who has five qualities.
an5.59:4.3: It’s hard to find someone gone forth when old who is sophisticated, well-presented, and learned, who can teach Dharma and has memorized the Vinaya.
an5.59:4.4: It’s hard to find someone gone forth when old who has these five qualities.”
